# numberOfTouchesRequired

**Instance Property**

The number of touches required in an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTouchBar] object for the gesture recognizer to match.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var numberOfTouchesRequired: Int { get set }
```

## Configuring the Gesture

- **buttonMask**: A bit mask of the button (or buttons) required to recognize this click.
- **numberOfClicksRequired**: The number of clicks required to match.
